### __Lab Schedule__
__Week 1__</br>
- Get vscode installed</br>
- Get a terminal working if you have windows. See [this](https://www.laptopmag.com/articles/use-bash-shell-windows-10) link </br>
- Mac OSX runs terminal natively </br>

__Week 2__</br>
- Introduction to the Command Line for Genomics 1 </br>
- Download the files for lab 2</br>
- Download and install [miniconda3](https://docs.conda.io/en/latest/miniconda.html) by the end of the lab  </br>

__Week 3__</br>
- Introduction to the Command Line for Genomics 2</br>

__Week 4__</br>
- Data Wrangling and Processing for Genomics 1</br>

__Week 5__ </br>
- Data Wrangling and Processing for Genomics 2</br>

__Week 6__ </br>
- Intro to R and RStudio for Genomics</br>

__Week 7__</br>
- Practical Exam Given in Lab

__Week 8__</br>
- BREAK

__Week 9__</br>
- Microbiome analysis 1</br>

__Week 10__</br>
- Microbiome analysis 2</br>

__Week 11__</br>
- Github and Cloud Computing</br>

__Week 11__</br>
- Data Analysis and Vis</br>

__Week 12__</br>
- Final Project work session

__Week 13__</br>
- Practical Exam Given in Lab </br>

__Week 13__</br>
- Final Project work session</br>
